tweet.text: On June 25, 1982, Pres. Ronald Reagan handed Amb. Ed Rowny a letter: “You are about to undertake one of the most important tasks of our age—the negotiation of an effective and equitable strategic arms reduction agreement.” https://t.co/0HBhTkIEvJ 📷 @Reagan_Library https://t.co/NjNaE99hnH
